Uses of Class
controller.Command

Packages that use Command
controller Executes commands issued by the GUI, such as making changes to the model or loading and saving data. 
 

Uses of Command in controller
 

Subclasses of Command in controller
 class AddComponent
          Implements the action for adding a component to the sandbox.
 class AddWire
          Implements the action for connecting components with a wire.
 class DeleteSelection
          Implements the actions for deleting all objects selected in the gui.
 class InsertWireNode
          Implements the actions for adding a new node to a wire, splitting a segment.
 class MoveSelection
          Implements the action for a moving a selection.
